column3: â€œğŸ“ğŸŒ² Blue Kush is a prime example of everything a good sativa-dominant hybrid should be. The smell and taste is fantastic, with strong flavors of pine, lemon and sweet berry immediately flooding the senses. I had high expectations set for this strain, as it came highly recommended to me by more than one person. They were exceeded. The initial feeling is an uplifting relief, quite relaxing, while the euphoria slowly c...â€
â€œOk so this is technically the second review because the first time I smoked it, I got so high I forgot I was reviewing a strain. That's how fucked up this strain is.â€
â€œI love it, it's been making me feel so happy and made me want to go out and be productive. Not like some that just put me on the couch and make me eat the kitchen.â€

â€œThe first thing I noticed about this particular strain is its enticing blueberry aroma. Its smells exactly fresh bought blueberries with no skunky side smell (Possibly a good strain to travel with.). The high can be described as being open " and "happy" accompanied with the feeling of a wandering mind. Great for celebrations or festivities. And lastly
column4: its a easy high to grasp even if you happened to be a seasoned t...â€"

column3: â€œDo you have multiple sclerosis or know anyone who has it? look no further. I have MS and I have been trying a lot of different strains to cope with the MS bullshit. Eureka, I have finally found it.  I strongly, anecdotally believe that this strain has the perfect genome for mood enhancement, muscle relaxation and sleep. Believe me (in Trump's voice), this is what every MSer dreams of. Ihighly recommend it.â€
â€œI am a first trimmer on this particular strain. The taste is 5 for 5, the same goes for the quality of the product and the smoke. If you haven't had blue kush, you need blue kush!!!â€

â€œThe smell, the taste, and the super smooth smoke make 
Blue Kush one of my favorites. This bud is a great social smoke and is perfect with a good dinner. Grab a glass of whatever sounds good and enjoy.
                              
                              Von.â€

â€œDelayed high. But when the high hits it's very strong and for a very long period of time. 
Had a migraine , smoked it and it completely stopped.â€
â€œI love it. My tolerance is kinda high and this one actually does a good job of killing my anxiety! Great for when you wake up in the middle of night and can't sleepğŸ‘ŒğŸ¾â€

â€œThe smell, the taste, and the super smooth smoke make 
Blue Kush one of my favorites. This bud is a great social smoke and is perfect with a good dinner. Grab a glass of whatever sounds good and enjoy.

â€œmy first home culture... i  wait to grow.â€
â€œI've been trying to write a review of Blue Kush for 3 days. Every time I try, I'm high off blue Kush which renders me useless. I feel like a superhero. Does this even make sense? I'm so high.â€

â€œLight and creative Head high,
Happy euphoria,
Tastes earthy and woody,
Creative juices flow,
Easy to focus and not too drowzy,
Stress relieving.â€
â€œGood stuff, can be used in late afternoon or night. Not a personal favorite because the high wasn't a good fit for me but definitely relaxing nonetheless.â€
â€œHappy high. One joint fixed a bad bipolar episodeâ€
â€œMy favorite taste in smoke with a mellow relaxing high.â€
â€œI am a first trimmer to this particular strain, and the taste is the most unique. These darker pretty dense nugs pack a punch of relief. Gotta get more blue kush!!!!#â€
â€œGood stuff, can be used in late afternoon or night. Not a personal favorite because the high wasn't a good fit for me but definitely relaxing nonetheless.â€
â€œAmazing lemon fuel smell. Easy to grow. Strong effect.â€

â€œPretty crazy strain to smoke, accidentally had it one night and later found out and that's why I realized why I wasn't scared at this party because it makes you so open and not to paranoid, also delay high takes about 10 minutes to start feeling effects so yeah this is quality stuff!â€
â€œAhhhhh. I'm all about Blueberry Anything and this is in top 5 of different blueberry strains I've tried. Love the ease & relaxation this  induces!â€

â€œNot a massive fan of sativa dominant hybrids, but with a smell and taste this good i have to dabble. Good daytime smoke for the skate park or walking the dog. Not the best at night if you have anxiety or sleeping issues ( you may need to get up at three in the morning to knock it out with a heavy indica ) but great for sitting around chatting or laughing about stupid shit. Great strainâ€
â€œPurchased as â€œAvatar OGâ€  but some research led me to Blue Kush. Very smooth flavor  and mellow and effects , used in  a Pax 3. Not my favorite but would definitely not pass up!!â€
â€œBy far this is my favorite!  I am a newbie and I was pleasantly surprised with this!  I needed something calming yet uplifting and this is awesome.â€
â€œReally fucks you up, slight dizziness and paranoia for me but the feeling is always enjoyable. Hunger also goes through the roof. Overall it's god damn great.â€

â€œA great sativa leaning hybrid. I smoked a joint of this on the beach and relaxed with my feet in the sand looking up at the sky. 
The clouds came down to me and I felt as if I was floating in them. 

Grew with three other cultivars and this one was a little sensitive to hot temps. Also one of my phenotypes turned purple.â€
â€œThis strain is very big in flavors . Mellow citrus flavor as smoke comes to taste . Beautiful buds that crumble to great size . One of my new favorites for sure !!â€
â€œBy far this is my favorite!  I am a newbie and I was pleasantly surprised with this!  I needed something calming yet uplifting and this is awesome.â€
â€œAn ok strain but not strong enough for my PTSD.â€

â€œOutdoor Growing 2016 Swiss Mountains: 
Small plant but Very strong taste and resinous, light blueberry taste
Perfect to relax after dinner and fall asleep.â€

â€œDecent smoke, Very heady, but still very relaxing. Promotes hunger and has a very uplifting cerebral high.Definitly a creeper. Smell is complex consisting of blueberry muffins and lemon with a piney profile. Very dense buds and sturdy stems. Unfortunately my sample was mechanically trimmed but still decent color with light greens and orange hairs.â€
â€œThis strain was everything you wanted in a strain had me feeling some type of way especially when your taking meds. Perfect mood everğŸ‘ğŸ½â€
â€œGrade a++++â€

â€œA really nice strain if you're looking for a stress reliever that isn't too drowsy. Perfect if you're looking for some productive motivation throughout your day! This
had a nice berry aftertaste. I wish more people knew about this strain. The high is equivalent to a more potent version of Green Crack. DEFINITELY recommend!!!â€
â€œLove this strain,  perfect to chill out and relax after workâ€

â€œI felt like a second review was required for this strain. got home from work, kushinated, stretched and meditated, cleaned, now shower and going to destroy some chicken cacciatore...so it helps with appetite. l like it.â€

â€œBlue Kush nice hearty strain to indulge in winter months with cold weather great on body and put mind at ease  high cbd Choco lust candies I picked in Salem,Or  10mg on deck.Wreaked of blue berries and kush citrus tones.High put me in the mood for sleep helped with pain from wearing boots.Taste of blueberries and pine.Great for lonely nights you feel nice confident with cbd on deck gives you that swagger.Today End's ...â€
â€œawesome taste and cool relaxation.â€
â€œimmediately upon consumption this was so smooth to inhale and treated my taste buds yup i have to give this a b ig thumbs up up whoever in the mit had the b.k. on logoâ€

â€œThis strain did me wonders. I was tasked with driving home at 2 a.m. and vaped some outta a Mighty, took some nice bong snaps, and then drank some of it infused in Kombucha, and WOWIE I was having a wonderful drive home exploring the passages of my brain and having wonderful conversations. Going to sleep also wasn't difficult. I would recommend if you are going to be in a social environment, a nonsocial environment, ...â€
â€œgets you f*cked up. great high - but doesnt make you sleepyâ€
â€œGreat for pain relief: cramps, back pain, nerve pain. It's a hybrid so you may feel buzzy rather than sleepy. Great for doing creative work (drawing, coloring et al). One of my new favorites.â€
â€œit get you high, but tastes like reggie. i wouldnt buy it again but its only my opinion.â€

â€œOne of my go to Strains, combining Blueberry and the famous OK Kush. This pair makes for a great strain. Mixing the blueberry with the pine and earthy flavors of OG Kush. This strain gives me an uplifting feeling with positive thoughtsâ€

â€œSmoked a big fat joint of this last summet and 15min later i was completely fucked up
It hits both your body and head, It brings you to another worldâ€

â€œWish I got more. Put in a relaxed state right away.  Just what I needed. Hope the dispensary has more next week.â€

â€œI like this strain. got it from high times (ehv). lovely bud with a full taste and sweet smell. smokes easy and hits me after a few tokes. Niceâ€

â€œI love this bud the first thing i noticed was how sweet it smelled it smelt like fresh blueberries its amazing. This is a must try strain its one of my top 5 honestly. I love the high this bud gives me i feel extremely happy and and wonderful its just hard to describe its just an amazing high. I actually just smoked a bowl of this bud and dabbed some shatter i made from this bud you gotta try this strainâ€
â€œhad 2 phenos. 1 was super fire crystally blue. the other was leafy with little crystals.â€

â€œI have  been growing this for a it 2 years and is one of my favs to grow. Created no anxiety and is great for energy but surprisingly really helps you sleep also. Perfect mixed taste of OG Kush and blueberry. Very dense nugs but aren't those type that are so dense that is so dense that it doesn't smoke  through evenly and your left with this dense little black bud with a lot of ash around it.â€

â€œI love the sweet, blueberry flavor  of this.  Very smooth as well.  My heart starts racing ant and my mind gets alert.  Feel uplifted and happy, on top of the Sativa effects I feel, I get a stoniness  like an OG.  Overall, this is a lot like Blue Dream. Maybe not as heady, but similarly mixed.â€
â€œOne of my favourites. Also the best yielding strain I have ever grown.â€

Small plant but Very strong taste and resinous, light blueberry taste
Perfect to relax after dinner and fall asleep.â€
â€œAn ok strain but not strong enough for my PTSD.â€
â€œSolid buzz. Very smooth and fruity tasting. That's the Blueberry coming in. Highly recommend.â€
â€œThis is both mine and my fiancÃ©'s favourite strain that we have tried so far. Gives a very nice energetic but relaxing high, without a nasty burnout. 100% recommendâ€

â€œIm on this right now - it's a happy cerebral but calm high. Very thought provoking, uplifting, hungry high. Eating lots of food and enjoying it. Approaching even taboo topics or uncomfortable concerns and actually being able to look at them objectively without feeling down at all.   Very elated is how I feel, and very elevated consciousness.â€
â€œA+ worth every puff! Great hiiiii and tastes awesome and smooth.â€

Smell is complex consisting of blueberry muffins and lemon with a piney profile. Very dense buds and sturdy stems. Unfortunately my sample was mechanically trimmed but still decent color with light greens and orange hairs.â€

â€œI'm usually not a fan of sativa dominant because I use marijuana for pain but this is a very good strain nevertheless. It relaxes you still and gives you a clear head high. Also like the flavor although it's not too strong and to me, not like blueberry.â€

â€œReally strong but after about an hour it puts you straight to sleep. Smells and tastes like berries. Perfect for a toke before bedâ€
â€œgreat strain with the best aroma out there but its nothing special. it will get you high and keep you high but not very good for anything else.â€

â€œI had a horrible reaction to this weed.  My body was over stimulated, over tingling and stabbing pains in my limbs, joints and upper arms and legs.  I have a bad case of fibromyalgia so I may be singular in my experience.       It could have pesticides in it.â€
â€œObtained medically labeled as an Indica. This variant is mellow in all medical and non-medical effects. Almost no high" feeling and a 3/10 for pain relief. Do not recommend.â€"
